recipesJson.name: TOC'S Strawberry Shortcake
recipesJson.author: TOCMichelleHughes
recipesJson.description: Cornish Cream Tea is basically a combined mix of Strawberry Red touch, Cookie, And Fresh Cream so you can sub those out if you don't have it.  Nonna's cake has a nice touch of lemon after it steeps and that works really well here for a soft subtle lemon.  The Strawberry Ripe make the Red stay a little longer, and Vienna Cream, is the cream for the recipe along with the sweetness of marshmallow.
